attributes.action: Hold a public inquiry into Russian interference in UK politics
attributes.additional_details: There are numerous reports of interference and attempted interference by the Russians in the political processes of several Western countries in recent years. Such interference is not acceptable in any country including the UK. A public inquiry is needed to determine the extent of any Russian interference in UK politics and to determine the extent of any undue influence the Russians may have had over our democratic processes and institutions, including Government Ministers and Members of Parliament.
attributes.background: Against the background of Russian aggression against the Ukraine there are widespread concerns that Russia has interfered in UK politics and continues to do so. To protect our democracy a full public inquiry should be held to determine if this is the case and if so, the extent of that interference
